folder.name: : Sinden LightGun
folder.desc: This folder contains the Sinden LightGun related scripts. You can find below in a txt file in /home/pi/apps/LightGun STEPS: - Add your lightgun games to a RetroArch system. Example LightGun, Arcade, NES etc. - Start SindenLightgunStartP1/P2 here (Options/Retropie Menu) - Go to System and start the lighgun game - Enter RetroArch GUI, HOTKEY+X, QUICK MENU/CONTROLS/PORT 2 CONTROLS set Device Type to Zapper - Back to SETTINGS/INPUT/PORT 2 CONTROLS To Assign LightGun Trigger to A. Its the first Lighgun Option from top. Then point your gun at the screen and press the trigger. Mouse 1 should appear next to it on the screen. - Back to QUICK MENU/OPTIONS, SHOW CROSSHAIR to ON (Recoil guns may require PORTS, RECOIL, STARTSINGLESHOT for crosshairs to display) - Go MAIN MENU, Configuration file, Save New Configuration. (If you want to delete, you ll find it with core name in /configs/all/retroarch/config

folder.desc: Enable USB Boot Mode to boot a USB burned image without the need of the SD card or extend your roms on an external USB MSD (Mass Storage Device).

game.name: ✭ Revamped External USB Roms Setup, 2P!

NOTE: If you wish to set a new external USB you need to run removal script and then connect and enable the new drive.

game.name: ✭ Screen Ratio Script, 2P!

game.desc: Change what appears on the runcommand screen. Enable or disable the menu, enable or disable box art and change CPU configuration.
